metadata.description: Experience the Pepsi-  fueled misadventures of  Bleu L. Finnegan, comics' favorite blue-haired, Buster Keaton-obsessed, Adam Ant-  worshipping teenager from the very beginning! Featuring an introduction from KIERON  GILLEN (THE WICKED + THE  DIVINE), this volume collects the original miniseries as well  as early short stories and more.
metadata.name: Blue Monday
